description: A provider class for managing tags in a Flutter application, fetching tags from notes stored in a database and notifying listeners on updates.

classes.name: TagsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class providing a list of tags used within the notes application, fetching data asynchronously from the database.

methods.name: fetchTags
methods.description: Loads all tags from all notes stored in the database, processes them to eliminate duplicates, and updates internal state.

methods.name: onNotesChanged
methods.description: Refreshes the list of tags when notes are changed by invoking fetchTags.
